headline: McDonald’s (MCD) Valuation Check as Shares Hover Near Record Highs
summary: McDonald's (MCD) quietly kept investors interested this week as the stock ticked higher, adding to gains from the past 3 months while its long term returns continue to outpace broader consumer stocks. See our latest analysis for McDonald's. At around $313 per share, McDonald’s steady year to date share price return and solid five year total shareholder return suggest momentum is gradually rebuilding as investors lean into its resilient cash flows and brand strength. If McDonald’s reliable...
